head_office_address: c/o Institution of Environmental Sciences 3rd Floor 140 London Wall
eu_initiatives:
Implementation of EU air quality Directives. 
Guidance on air quality issues not regulated in the same way e.g. odours, short-term operating reserve, construction sites..
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
membership: As part of the Institution of Environmental Sciences (IES), Institute for Air Quality Management members may gain recognition as Chartered Scientists through the Science Council and/or as Chartered Environmentalists through the Society for the Environment. The IES is a member of EFEAP, the European Federation of Associations of Environmental Professionals.
relevant_communication:
UK response to exceedence of air quality limit values. 
UK National Plan to meet NO2 limit values
goals__remit: The IAQM is a professional body which seeks to maintain, enhance and promote the highest standards of working practices in the field of air quality and for the development of those who undertake this work.
